Package com.nagarro.imageutility.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CheckUserNameServlet
    Servlet implementation class CheckUserNameServlet.It is feature which will used to check for available username from the database and using event it helps to show if user tries to type an username which is already available
    DeleteImageServlet
    Servlet implementation class DeleteImageServlet which is used to control the deletion of images from the server on user click.
    EditImageServlet
    Servlet implementation class EditImageServlet.It is similar to delete image servlet which edit the image information like name form the database and update it in the database as well as in browser
    ErrorHandlerServlet
    Servlet implementation class ErrorHandlerServlet.
    ImageMgmtServlet
    Servlet implementation class ImageMgmtServlet.This will manage the image input checking the image size and inserting the image in the database
    LoginServlet
    Servlet implementation class LoginServlet.It is used handle login information provided by the user by getting the username and password from the user
    MailerServlet
    Servlet implementation class MailerServlet which handle the mailing request it works on SMTP protocol and here it is used to send the password whe user forget its password.
    RegisterServlet
    Servlet implementation class RegisterServlet Control all the registration process of the user and store the data in the database.
    RetreiveImageServlet
    Servlet implementation class RetreiveImageServlet helps to get the image from the database using byte stream and show it in the browser
    RetreiveImgDataServlet
    Servlet implementation class RetreiveImgDataServlet.
